<p style="font-size:14pt">This site hosts a list of questions asked as a part of the RAPID Survey project. All efforts were taken to ensure the accuracy of the question sources.</p>

<p style="font-size:14pt">Use the menu above to navigate between our household survey questions and our childcare provider survey questions.</p>

<p style="font-size:14pt">If there are any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to the RAPID Survey Project team.</p>

<p style="font-size:14pt">Suggested citation (APA7): 
Stanford Center on Early Childhood, Stanford University. (n.d.). RAPID Survey Project. RAPID Question Bank. Retrieved DATE from https://r3questionbank.netlify.app/  </p>
